text: The 2017 CMA Awards, Hosted for the 10th Time by Brad Paisley and Carrie Underwood, Airs Live from Bridgestone Arena in Nashville Wednesday, Nov. 8 at 8 : 00 PM / ET on the ABC Television Network Nominations for CMA Broadcast Personality of the Year and Radio Station of the Year Also Revealed NASHVILLE — Miranda Lambert tops the list of nominees for “ The 51st Annual CMA Awards ” with five nominations. Little Big Town and Keith Urban each garner four nominations, tying for the second most nominations this year. “ The talent of the past year for Country has been exceptional, ” said Sarah Trahern, CMA Chief Executive Officer.
